attributes.action: After leaving the EU give £350m a week extra funding to the NHS
attributes.additional_details: I would like the Leave campaign proposal to be honoured and see additional £350m a week in NHS funding.
attributes.background: In the run in to the Referendum on existing the European Union a proposal was made by one of the core Leave campaigns that members of the sitting Government and Convervative party were associated with. I would like that promise to be honoured and see additional £350m a week in NHS funding.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/327376

You may be interested to know that the Government has introduced a new law that will increase funding for the NHS by £33.9 billion a year (in cash terms) by 2023/24. You can find out more here: https://services.parliament.uk/Bills/2019-21/nhsfunding.html
